translations: v.屠宰；告发；争吵（beef的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: vt. 加强（增援，充实）；补充（人数， 兵力）等
n. 牛肉馅；绞碎的牛肉
n. 浓缩牛肉汁；牛肉膏
牛肉面；家传牛肉面；牛肉火锅面
红烩牛肉；清炖牛肉；红煨牛肉

sentences.sentence: They are bred in farms, just like pigs, beefs, lambs, chicken and other farm animals.
sentences.translation: 他们是在农场长大，就像猪，肉牛，羊，鸡等家畜。

sentences.sentence: In addition to allowing us to search the RMS for records, this MIDlet beefs up the user interface we've worked with so far.
sentences.translation: 除了可以在RMS中搜索记录，这个MIDlet还加强了用户界面。

sentences.sentence: After extra than a hour, can at last package more than 10 set beefs in archive, until the package fills up just come to a stop.
sentences.translation: 一个多小时后，包裹里可算是装了10多组牛肉，直到包裹装满了才停下来。
